Verve Strike.name: Verve Strike
Verve Strike.flavor: Swearing by your existence, you smite your enemy, dazing him and rallying an ally's spirit.
Verve Strike.target: One creature within your melee reach.
Verve Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. You also grant yourself or an ally within 10 squares of you that you can see a number of temporary hit points equal to 5 + the higher of your Wisdom modifier or Charisma modifer.

Empathic Resonance.name: Empathic Resonance
Empathic Resonance.flavor: When you successfully withstand an attack's lasting effects, your allies find it easy to follow your example.
keywords: Personal   Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 bonus to saving throws. Whenever you succeed on a saving throw, one ally of your choice within 10 squares of you can make a saving throw against an effect of his or her choice immediately (as long as a save can end the effect). This effect persists until the end of the encounter or for 5 minutes.
Empathic Resonance.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 bonus to saving throws. Whenever you succeed on a saving throw, one ally of your choice within 10 squares of you can make a saving throw against an effect of his or her choice immediately (as long as a save can end the effect). This effect persists until the end of the encounter or for 5 minutes.

Unleashed Vigor.name: Unleashed Vigor
Unleashed Vigor.flavor: You sunder the ties of your for's life force, invigorating you and your allies.
Unleashed Vigor.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage and ongoing 10 damage (save ends). After effect: Ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
Unleashed Vigor.onMiss: Half damage and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
Unleashed Vigor.effect: Each time your target takes ongoing damage from this power, you or one ally of your choice within 5 squares of the target regains 5 hit points.
